title: EIM68515 - Tax treatment of racehorse trainingor stud farm establishment employees

details.body:
The allowances paid to stable lads when they have to work away
from their normal place of work are:

*   overtime, see[EIM68520](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM65799#EIM68520)

*   Sunday racing payment, see[EIM68520](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM65799#EIM68520)

*   racing abroad allowance, see[EIM68520](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM65799#EIM68520)

*   overnight allowance, see[EIM68525](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM65799#EIM68525)

*   daily allowance, see[EIM68525](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM65799#EIM68525).
